body.name: Fitdom Black Small Tactical Messenger Bag For Men. This EDC Has Multiple Ways to Carry as Sling, Shoulder, Crossbody, Waist.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 23 mins
features: COMPACT, STYLISH AND FUNCTIONAL – Measured at 10 in. x 8 in. x 1 in., it is a tactical inspired small cross body messenger with bell and whistle. Add another pouch on the molle webbing for extra capacity, attach hand sanitizer on the D ring, or even personalize it with a hook patch. It is an everyday carry for people on the go.

5 COMPARTMENTS TO STAY ORGANIZED – Life is too short to look for things. It has one small front pocket for keys and money. Two medium size front compartments for phones & cords. One main compartment big enough to fit an iPad or tablet up 10” in size. One back pocket for ID and cards. It has a pocket for everything so you don’t have to waste time looking for them.

4 WAYS TO WEAR FOR ANY OCCASION – The 1 inch strap can transform the bag to 4 different styles. A chest bag for quick access to your items. A shoulder bag for on the go moments. A cross body bag or fanny waist pack to keep it close to you in crowded areas. It can also be adjusted to left or right carry.

WATER, CUT AND PUNCTURE RESISTANT – Constructed from heavy duty polyester, it has a sturdy exterior that provides protection from water spill, puncture from pen, and even cut from knife. With the 1/8 inch padded interior, you can put your trust in this bag in case of drops, spill and even theft.
body.description: At Fitdom, we believe there is a bag for everything and more. Inspired by the extreme environment of tactical sports, we created a small crossbody bag that is versatile, tough, and capable of your adventures. - Perfect size for Everyday Carry (EDC). - Multiple pockets to stay organized. - Molle webbing, D rings for quick access attachment. - 4 different carry styles for both lefty and righty. - Protection for your electronics and your belongings. - Bold and unique. One of the kind. Our customer loves our product but you will not know it till you try it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good small golf pouch
reviews.reviewText: I stuff my valuables into this bag and put it in my golf bag and it works perfectly. Keeps everything safe and sound and it's eminently transportable from the bag into the pub. I've renamed it a dossier to inoculate myself from the accusations of owning a man purse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional with lots of pockets
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift for my dad and he was very happy with it. From what I saw of it, I liked the feel and color of the orange and slightly bigger than normal rubber zippers. In my mind, it made it easy for him to quickly find and use them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great bag for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with the purchase. Bag seems to be constructed with higher grade materials compared to other bags in the same price range.It’s able to hold everything I could stuff in there and is still comfortable to carry.The oversized zippers make it easy to open and add some comfort knowing the bag can be quickly opened “ if needed “…I would have given 5 stars but I have had a zipper pop open twice now. I truly believe I had that compartment overstuffed and simply moved things around, I have not experienced it since. However it was surprising to see since like I said everything seems really stout, just had me wondering if I have a faulty zipper.I would recommend this bag to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Carries my 9mm very nicely
reviews.reviewText: Carries my 9mm very nicely. Very nice pack for my edc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little bag for stay at home dad
reviews.reviewText: Love this bag. I had a small bag that I kept my shopping list in and would take to the store. I also had a small EDC bag but would leave it in the car. This bag solved my issue. I keep my grocery and to do list with pen in main pocket, I keep several small tools, multitool, eyeglass repair kit, sewing kit, small first aid kit, safety pins, batteries and superglue in other 2 larger pockets. Flosser picks. small toothbrush and paste, aspirin in small outside pocket. Wipes and some paper towels (folded) in large rear pocket. I added a MOLLE cell phone carrier to the front. Everything I need for every day events. The zippers and pulls are very sturdy. The strap is a little thin but added a small cushion to the strap to keep from shoulder digging. Store, playground, back yard - this thing really is perfect and very small - sits over head on shoulder with bag slightly toward my back to keep my hands free. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits a full size handgun snugly plus everything I need.
reviews.reviewText: Overall the bag is nice. Holds my Sig P320 (in a kydex holster), wallet, phone, inhaler, keys, etc. nicely. One thing I will say though, never carry a loaded handgun with 1 in the chamber with only the Velcro provided, put it in a leather or kydex holster and then put it in the Velcro holster provided. You don’t want to be that guy who has an ND at Walmart. Luckily it fits my kydrx holster perfectly and easily clips into the Velcro to make drawing my weapon possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good value thin pouch but no expanding & terrible strap and no handle
reviews.reviewText: Great pouch for the money, zips, zip pulls and subdued look in black but too many D rings and not enough capability for expanding. There is also a really cheap &terrible strap and no handle for hand carrying so you have to either replace the strap with one of your own or hold the pouch from the bottom. A little expandability would really help here. For example, when my wallet, keys and phone are in the pack, I can't fit a pair of sunglasses unless they come in a thin case. I'd also like to see a soft-lines area for glasses. It comes with a pretty cool looking carabiner but I really wish it had a better spot for shades and a grab handle since I don't think I'll carry it like a sling.

La uso todos los días, es realmente útil para llevar lo necesario sin exagerar. Es para salir de paseo y tal. Los materiales son de buena calidad. Lo único que no me agrada del todo es que sus seguros son plásticos, se sienten sólidos sin embargo por el precio deberían ser metálicos así como los cierres.

I was needing a bag which would handle my radio equipment on a chest harness and this worked perfectly. It is built tough and really is what i needed for size. The next chest harness type bag was over 200 dallars. Saves myself loads of cash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Been searching for a small bag to carry my phone, keys and money for ages, tried and few bags but this one is the best, comfortable, and has 5 pockets to put stuff in, i added a Mountaineering Buckle Outdoor Keychain to it for more options, I highly recommend this bag.
Amazing product, no regrets at all
